body.name: Aspiron Corded Stick Vacuum Cleaner, Small Vacuum Cleaner with 20kPa Powerful Suction, Crevice Tool, Filter, 5-in-1 Handheld Lightweight Bagless Vacuum Cleaner for Home, Carpet and Floor (Black)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 13 hrs 11 mins
features: Powerful and Compact: With 20kPa strong suction power, our 600W corded stick vacuum offers exceptional cleaning performance in a compact, easy to move design.

Versatile 5-in-1 Design: Equipped with a flexible hose, 2-in-1 cleaning tool, floor brush, and crevice tool, our stick vacuum cleans carpets and floors with ease, making it suitable for just about every cleaning task.
Large Capacity Dust Cup: The 0.9L dust cup provides generous space for collecting dirt and debris, so you can quickly dispose of its content without frequent trips to the dustbin.

High-Efficiency Filtration: Our lightweight vacuum cleaner comes with advanced HEPA filtration coupled with flexible sponge filters, achieving an impressive F9 efficiency rating. This ensures that allergens and fine particles are effectively captured, leaving indoor air fresh and clean.

Extended Power Cord: With a 16 ft long power cord, our stick vacuum offers maximum flexibility and convenience, enabling you to clean larger areas without having to switch outlets to access hard-to-reach spots.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Efficient Carpet & Floor Cleaning Floor brush thoroughly cleans carpets, while the powerful suction is perfect on hard floors. Converts to a Handheld Vacuum Equipped with a crevice tool, this versatile vacuum removes dust and debris from between couch cushions and other hard-to-reach spaces.
With multiple accessories and lightweight design, this corded stick vacuum can easily solve cleaning problems in different positions, making your home more clean and comfortable.

Easy Tool Switching Just insert the metal rod or different brush tools as needed and you're good to go. Easy to Use Powerful 20000pa stick vacuum cleaner with one-click mode switching that’s easy to use and efficient.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars the Aspiron Corded Stick Vacuum Cleaner"
reviews.reviewText: The Aspiron Corded Stick Vacuum Cleaner is a powerful and versatile cleaning solution. With an impressive 20kPa suction, it effortlessly tackles dirt on carpets and floors. The inclusion of a crevice tool and filter adds to its functionality, making it a comprehensive choice for home cleaning. Its lightweight design enhances maneuverability, ensuring efficient use. A reliable and efficient bagless vacuum cleaner for hassle-free maintenance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was in search of a small vacuum and decided to give this one a shot. Considering its low cost and simplicity, I didn't have high expectations. However, it turned out to be worth the money – very light, easy to assemble, and suitable for small apartments. I recommend this item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but mighty
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical when I opened the box. This vac is small & lightweight. It almost resembles a child's toy. Don't be fooled, though! It's got powerful suction. There's no roller/beater bar, so def not for extensive use on carpets. I like that there's no roller for all the hair in this house to wind around. Does a great job in corners and along baseboards. Highly recommend. I'm ordering another for upstairs bathrooms!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Happy Cleaning,Happy Home !!
reviews.reviewText: The Aspiron Corded Stick Vacuum Cleaner is a game-changer! With a powerful 20kPa suction, it effortlessly tackles dirt and debris on various surfaces. The inclusion of a crevice tool, filter, and its 5-in-1 handheld versatility make it an all-in-one cleaning solution. Lightweight and efficient, it's a must-have for home, carpet, and floor cleaning. The sleek black design adds a touch of sophistication.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Small Yet Powerful Beast!
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this stick vac. I bought it during prime days to replace an old stick vac I had bought 3 years ago that broke. This one is far superior to my old one. Features that I love are: it actually sucks debris and hair off all of the surfaces in my home, it stands up on its own, the accessories attach right to it so they aren’t laying in a closet somewhere, the battery pops off and can be charged independently, it’s easy to use, lightweight, it has led lights on the floor brush roll, I can go on and on. It only took about an hour to fully charge the first time. The battery is down 1 bar since a full charge after one day. But I can’t stop vacuuming everything in my house. It even picked up grass that was stuck on to my entry mats. My big vacuum can barely do that. This is prob not a vacuum to do a whole house full of carpet or heavy duty deep cleaning for hours but if you want something for in between guests, crumbs from your kids, those hairball tumbleweeds from pets or whatever other annoying messes that happen…this vac is amazing. I would 100% buy this again and recommend it to others. Can’t go wrong with this one, buy it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good value and suction of the vacuum cleaner. works great on hard floors, and has powerful suction. it is easy to move around, maneuver, and use around furniture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Powerful and valuable
reviews.reviewText: It worth the money. Very good quality and easy to assemble. It’s multi-way vacuum that can be used at home and car. If it can use the usb that will be great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s so portable and handy
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I really like the size of this vaccum cleaner. You can adjust the height as per your requirement and then put it back in a closet.Moreover, it’s easy to assembly and then disassemble back and put it in a box.
